泛.definition: (bound form) general; non-specific; extensive; pan-; to flood; (literary) to float about; to be suffused with (a color, emotion, odor etc)

泛得林.definition: (Tw) ventolin, aka salbutamol, an asthma drug

泛指.definition: to make a general reference; to be used in a general sense

泛濫成災.definition: lit. to flood (idiom); fig. rampant; in plague proportions

泛珠三角.definition: Pan-Pearl River delta; The nine provinces of Southern China around Guangzhou and the Pearl River delta; South China

泛珠江三角.definition: the Pan-Pearl river delta (economic zone including the 5 provinces around Guangzhou and Hong Kong)

泛白.definition: to be suffused with white; faded; bleached; to blanch

泛神論.definition: pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe

泛稱.definition: to refer broadly to; general term

泛自然神論.definition: pandeism, theological theory that God created the Universe and became one with it

泛論.definition: to discuss in general terms; general exposition; general discussion

泛讀.definition: (language education) to read swiftly, aiming to get the gist; extensive reading

泛起.definition: to appear; to emerge; to surface

泛酸.definition: pantothenic acid; vitamin B5; to surge up (of acid in the stomach)
